Summary: Objects (5) doing forms recorded on video.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Aguascalientes
There were no other sightings in Aguascalientes on or around December 21st 2008
divs: sighting detailsi uploaded a video on youtube, it was recorded for a friend of mine (vicente fernando gumzna) last december 21st, here in aguascalientes. as i'm writing these lines i'm uploading a second video recorded on the same month but on the 24th. fernando was outside the city in "cerro del picacho" (picacho hill) with his family and recorded 5 (there were 6) objects, you can see in the video that they create some sort of formations in the sky here is the link http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=ulxtvody98g please take a look and give me your opinion. best regards
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
